Grain.Do: Quinoa (1/2 cup cooked), Basmati rice (1/2 cup cooked), Oats (1/2 cup cooked), Barley (1/2 cup cooked)
Grain.Dont: Refined flour products (white bread, pasta), excessive amounts of rye or millet

Legume.Do: Mung dal (1/2 cup cooked), Lentils (1/2 cup cooked), Chickpeas (1/4 cup cooked)
Legume.Dont: Kidney beans, black beans, excessive amounts of any heavy legumes

Veg.Do: Cooked root vegetables (carrots, sweet potatoes, beets - 1 cup), Squash (butternut, zucchini - 1 cup), Asparagus (1 cup), Okra (1 cup)
Veg.Dont: Raw cruciferous vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, cabbage - if raw), nightshades in excess (tomatoes, bell peppers)

Spices.Do: Ginger (fresh or dried - 1/4 tsp), Cumin (1/4 tsp), Coriander (1/4 tsp), Cardamom (pinch), Fennel (pinch), Turmeric (pinch)

Leafy veg.Do: Cooked spinach (1 cup), Cooked kale (1 cup), Cooked fenugreek leaves (methi - 1 cup), Cooked coriander leaves (1 cup)
Leafy veg.Dont: Raw leafy greens if you experience bloating or gas

Oil.Do: Ghee (1-2 tsp), Sesame oil (1-2 tsp), Coconut oil (1-2 tsp)
Oil.Dont: Excessive amounts of any oil, cold processed oils if Vata is aggravated

Fruits.Do: Cooked apples or pears (1/2 cup), Ripe bananas (1/2), Dates (2-3), Sweet berries (strawberries, blueberries - 1/2 cup)
Fruits.Dont: Raw fruits on an empty stomach, citrus fruits in excess, very sour or unripe fruits

Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Large quantities, dry roasted nuts without soaking

Milk product.Do: Warm milk with cardamom (1 cup), Ghee (see oil), Paneer (small portion, well-cooked)
Milk product.Dont: Cold milk, yogurt (especially at night), excessive cheese

Condiments.Do: Fresh ginger-mint chutney (small amount), Tamarind chutney (mild, small amount), Lime juice (mild)
Condiments.Dont: Spicy, sour, or fermented pickles in excess, overly processed sauces
